attributes.description:
1st Installment December 2022
Here are some of what the team at Motus Select Kia Durban offers you in making the purchase of your new preowned car a positive and stress free one.
1)	We can tailor make a deal to suit you.
2)	In house 101-point check and AA Dekra road worthy are done on all our cars.
3)	In house Finance department offering you the best deal from the major banks.
4)	We also have loads of products to assist you while owning your car. Here are a few:
Service plans, maintenance plans, extended warranty, warranty booster, renew tech, tracking system, crystal fusion and safety film.
Nationwide delivery. All Trade-in's welcome. Finance can be arranged, Contact us today! Price excludes on the road fees.

attributes.description:
2017 BMW X5, 89186 KM, BLUE with BLACK.

05061460
  Original exterior colour is blue, vehicle is grey wrapped. All available records show the odometer reading on this vehicle to be accurate. There is not a skip or slip, just pure smoothness in this vehicle's transmission. The vehicle engine runs very, very smooth. This vehicle's exterior is very clean. This is a very well maintained vehicle with a clean interior. You should feel good with at least 75% of tire wear left on this set of rubber.

attributes.description: This amazing Haval H2 has every feature in the book for an amazing price. Android auto, reverse camera, sunroof and leather interior all for under R300 000 is a bargain. This H2 is in immaculate condition and is as good as new. It has the remainder of the factory warranty and service plan still in place and is spotless. This H2 really is a smooth drive and all the features will make sure you drive in style and luxury. Just some of the features include: Sunroof, reverse camera, android radio, navigation, cruise control, leather interior, auto lights and wipers, dash cam and more

attributes.description: Don't miss out on this spectacular SUV. This X5 is one of South Africa's most popular family SUV's for a reason. This X5 is in excellent condition with a full BMW service history and low mileage. Luxury features, good performance and a reliable engine make this the ideal choice for your next family SUV. This X5 is spotless and as good as new. Some of the features of this awesome SUV are: Sunroof, reverse camera, PDC, electric tailgate, xenon headlights, cruise control, multi-function steering wheel, keyless start, dynamic drive select and more
